page.title: 09Grimethorpe Colliery Band
page.content: Grimethorpe Colliery Band was formed in 1917 and made its first broadcast in 1932.The band was well known in the '30s and '40s for their broadcasts and concerts especially during the war years.From 1960 the band has enjoyed success after success touring Europe, Australia and representing Great Britain in the U.S.A. with the Queen to celebrate the Bicentennery of the U.S.A. Grimethorpe Colliery Band is one of the top five brass bands in the country. In the last 23 years(from the start of 1962)the GRIMETHORPE COLLIERY BAND has competed at a total of 138 competitions,with the following results:-FIRSTS 53;SECONDS 33; THIRDS 20;FOURTHS 9;FIFTHS 2; SIXTHS 2;UNPLACED 19 times TOTAL 138
